spinner.Name: Group
spinner.tooltip: Boss will pick random group to use for next set of attacks If there are multiple whispers in a room, they will always pick separate groups

spinner.Name: Sweep Index
spinner.tooltip: Boss will move between Sweep Points in order of Sweep Index (low to high or high to low)

spinner.Name: X Offset
spinner.tooltip: Position will be moved N grids in the X direction Negative is left, positive is right

spinner.Name: Y Offset
spinner.tooltip: Position will be moved N grids in the Y direction Negative is up, positive is down

checkbox.Name: Loop
checkbox.tooltip: If set, Sweep attack will loop around indices rather than reversing direction

checkbox.Name: Spawn With Grate
checkbox.tooltip: Spawn a grate under Tsar on init.

checkbox.Name: Shift 20 Units Right
checkbox.tooltip: Aligns to grid edge rather than centre.

checkbox.Name: Shift 20 Units Down
checkbox.tooltip: Aligns to grid edge rather than centre.

spinner.Name: Initial Delay
spinner.tooltip: Negative initial delay means it will spawn projectiles as if it fired BEFORE the layout was loaded

spinner.Name: Loop Delay
spinner.tooltip: If set above -1, repeats its attack every 0.X seconds.

spinner.Name: Initial Delay
spinner.tooltip: Negative initial delay means it will spawn projectiles as if it fired BEFORE the layout was loaded

spinner.Name: Loop Delay
spinner.tooltip: If set above -1, repeats its attack every 0.X seconds.

spinner.Name: Initial Delay
spinner.tooltip: Negative initial delay means it will spawn projectiles as if it fired BEFORE the layout was loaded

spinner.Name: Loop Delay
spinner.tooltip: If set above -1, repeats its attack every 0.X seconds.

spinner.Name: Initial Delay
spinner.tooltip: Negative initial delay means it will spawn projectiles as if it fired BEFORE the layout was loaded

dial.Name: Angle Offset By
dial.tooltip: Angle fired projectiles are offset by each time this eye fires

spinner.Name: Aura Size
spinner.tooltip: Size of the darkness aura. 40 is roughly a 3*3 area, 100 roughly covers the height of a single normal room.

spinner.Name: Cuffed Entities
spinner.tooltip: Number of entities Cuffs will connect to (minimum of 2).

spinner.Name: Max Distance
spinner.tooltip: Maximum distance (in-game units) allowed between cuffed entities (minimum of 40).

checkbox.Name: Is Leader
checkbox.tooltip: All grouped Unshornz will follow this one.

spinner.Name: Jump Distance
spinner.tooltip: Distance the Fuego will jump based on the center of the Spawner. It will die on the 7th bounce.

slider.Name: Step
slider.tooltip: Number of Segments of the same type next to each other (try this out to understand it better)

spinner.Name: Attack Delay
spinner.tooltip: The Ashtray will wait (displayed value * 5 frames) to swallow its cigarettes.

spinner.Name: Wander Radius
spinner.tooltip: Maximum radius (in-game units) from starting position Empath will wander (minimum of 10).

spinner.Name: Aura Size
spinner.tooltip: Size of the Nihilist's aura. 120 roughly covers the height of a single normal room.

spinner.Name: Max Distance
spinner.tooltip: Size of targeting aura.

dropdown.choice: Stays Active on Room Clear - No
Stays Active on Room Clear - Yes

dropdown.Name: Starting Grid Clamp
dropdown.tooltip: Determines the starting corner of the grid that the Disc spawns on. For example, Top Left means it clamps to the top left corner of its initial grid.

checkbox.Name: Alternate Sprite
checkbox.tooltip: Should this Bead Fly use the Ringpull sprite from Ripcord-spawned strings.

spinner.Name: Bullet ammount
spinner.tooltip: Number of bullets Punisher shoots per attack.

spinner.Name: Aura Size
spinner.tooltip: Size of the Eye of Shaggoth's aura. 60 is Glass Eye-sized, 150 roughly covers the height of a single normal room.

checkbox.Name: Stays Active
checkbox.tooltip: If checked, continues to stomp down even when the room is clear.

spinner.Name: Gas Size
spinner.tooltip: Max number of gas rings. Default is 5

spinner.Name: Number of Randomly Spawned Oralids
spinner.tooltip: Number of Oralids that will be spawned in random locations close to the Oralopede. Active / Dormant state will match the Oralopede.

spinner.Name: Fuse Length
spinner.tooltip: Number of seconds until Spoop tries to attack.

checkbox.Name: Leader
checkbox.tooltip: If checked, prioritized to lead the group of nearby scuzzes

spinner.Name: Group Number
spinner.tooltip: Which ring a skuzz is part of

spinner.Name: Distance
spinner.tooltip: Number of segments between Flamin and its fire. Actual game distance = displayed value * 25, where 40 is the length of a grid

checkbox.Name: Can be Contained
checkbox.tooltip: Determines if this hooligan is inside another

spinner.Name: Contained Entities
spinner.tooltip: Number of entities contained within the hooligan (minimum 1)

spinner.Name: Aura Size
spinner.tooltip: Size of the Infected Mushroom's aura. 80 roughly covers the height of a single normal room. 40 is roughly a 3*3 area.

spinner.Name: Frame Offset
spinner.tooltip: How many frames the Redema is offset when starting

dropdown.choice: Shifted to the right a little bit

checkbox.Name: Regenerating
checkbox.tooltip: Regenerating Dungeon Masters continually spawn new Key Fiends but die on room clear.

spinner.Name: Enemies Locked
spinner.tooltip: Number of nearby enemies that will be given Dungeon Locks. Dungeon Locked enemies dissappear if all Dungeon Masters in the room are killed.

spinner.Name: Number of Randomly Spawned Pawns
spinner.tooltip: Number of Pawns that will be spawned in random locations close to the King.

spinner.Name: Frame Offset
spinner.tooltip: How many frames the Redema is offset when starting

spinner.Name: Delay
spinner.tooltip: Determines the delay in Spook copying player movement Delay = displayed value * 5 frames

spinner.Name: Count
spinner.tooltip: If set above 1, spawns N Spooks with sequential delays from Delay.

spinner.Name: Interval
spinner.tooltip: Determines how long Wailer will remain tangible/intangible. Display value * 5 frames

spinner.Name: Delay
spinner.tooltip: Determines added initial delay for when Wailer will activate. Display value * 5 frames

dropdown.Name: Movement Direction
dropdown.tooltip: If Stationary movement pattern is used, this option can be ignored.

spinner.Name: Time Between Shots
spinner.tooltip: Delay after each time firing Delay = displayed value * 12.5 frames

spinner.Name: Initial Delay
spinner.tooltip: Initial delay before firing, used to create offset pipes Delay = displayed value * 12.5 frames

spinner.Name: Creep Timeout
spinner.tooltip: How long the creep spawned by the pipe lasts Creep Timeout = displayed value * 12.5 frames

spinner.Name: Time Between Shots
spinner.tooltip: Delay after each time firing Delay = displayed value * 12.5 frames

spinner.Name: Initial Delay
spinner.tooltip: Initial delay before firing, used to create offset pipes Delay = displayed value * 12.5 frames

spinner.Name: Creep Timeout
spinner.tooltip: How long the creep spawned by the pipe lasts Creep Timeout = displayed value * 12.5 frames

spinner.Name: Time Between Shots
spinner.tooltip: Delay after each time firing Delay = displayed value * 12.5 frames

spinner.Name: Initial Delay
spinner.tooltip: Initial delay before firing, used to create offset pipes Delay = displayed value * 12.5 frames

spinner.Name: Creep Timeout
spinner.tooltip: How long the creep spawned by the pipe lasts Creep Timeout = displayed value * 12.5 frames

spinner.Name: Time Between Shots
spinner.tooltip: Delay after each time firing Delay = displayed value * 12.5 frames

spinner.Name: Initial Delay
spinner.tooltip: Initial delay before firing, used to create offset pipes Delay = displayed value * 12.5 frames

spinner.Name: Creep Timeout
spinner.tooltip: How long the creep spawned by the pipe lasts Creep Timeout = displayed value * 12.5 frames

spinner.Name: Time Between Shots
spinner.tooltip: Delay after each time firing Delay = displayed value * 12.5 frames

spinner.Name: Initial Delay
spinner.tooltip: Initial delay before firing, used to create offset pipes Delay = displayed value * 12.5 frames

spinner.Name: Creep Timeout
spinner.tooltip: How long the creep spawned by the pipe lasts Creep Timeout = displayed value * 12.5 frames

spinner.Name: Group
spinner.tooltip: Will be triggered at the same time as other Nervies in the same group.

dial.Name: Angle
dial.tooltip: If this is a Nervie Wave, determines the angle the wave will travel.

checkbox.Name: Deactive on Room Clear
checkbox.tooltip: If checked, then Dogrock will not be required to be killed to clear the room.

checkbox.Name: Deactive on Room Clear
checkbox.tooltip: If checked, then Dogrock will not be required to be killed to clear the room.

checkbox.Name: Vulnerable
checkbox.tooltip: If checked, orbiting enemies will be vulnerable.

checkbox.Name: Die when host is Killed
checkbox.tooltip: If checked, orbiting enemies will die when the host is killed.

spinner.Name: Orbiting Entities
spinner.tooltip: Number of entities Specturn will make orbit.

spinner.Name: Max Distance
spinner.tooltip: Maximum distance (in half grids) of the orbit.

checkbox.Name: Sine Wave Path
checkbox.tooltip: If checked, moves in a sine wave. Otherwise, moves straight.

checkbox.Name: Randomize Position
checkbox.tooltip: If checked, randomly sets its Y position each time it enters the screen

spinner.Name: X Offset
spinner.tooltip: Number of grids to offset X position by. Negative is left, positive is right.
